question: Who has been appointed as the new governor of Mizoram in November 2019?
explanation: P.S. Sreedharan Pillai was sworn in as the new Governor of Mizoram on 5<sup>th</sup> November 2019. The oath-taking ceremony was administered by Chief Justice of Guwahati High Court Justice Ajai Lamba at the Raj Bhavan, Mizoram. Mr.Pillai is the third Governor to be appointed as Mizoram Governor from Kerala. The other two governors from Kerala were Vakkom Purushothaman and Kummanam Rajasekharan.
